reviews.review_msg: There are three exams which make up 90% of the grade and 10% quizzes that you have to make up every week. The lectures are 3 hours long and very boring especially since it was online and it was just 3 hours videos of him talking. The lectures are more examples and about important people instead of clearly defining the concepts in the book.
His cognition  is very obtuse and adept.

VERY intelligent man, however, he is impossibly hard. Pop-up quizzed force you to attend boring lectures. He dwells on the easy and skims through the hard and only tests you on the hard. Unless you study for this course EVERY NIGHT, this course will ruin your GPA! Smart guy, but makes a VERY HARD PROF!!!!!!
